function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Long incubation period of COVID-19","Impact":"Delayed symptom onset can lead to longer periods of undetected spread and higher infection ratios in cities","Mitigation":"Implement rigorous testing and contact tracing measures to identify and isolate infected individuals","Technologies":"Rapid testing kits, digital contact tracing apps","People":"General population, healthcare workers, public health officials","Owner":"Healthcare institutions, public health agencies, government authorities"},{"Description":"High density of Points of Interest (POIs) in urban areas","Impact":"Increased risk of virus transmission due to crowded and busy areas","Mitigation":"Enforce social distancing measures, limit capacity in crowded spaces, increase sanitation efforts","Technologies":"AI surveillance systems, automated crowd monitoring, contactless payment systems","People":"Local residents, visitors, employees at POIs","Owner":"City governments, business owners, property managers"},{"Description":"Inadequate transportation infrastructure data for identifying high-risk areas","Impact":"Difficulty in identifying and targeting transportation hubs as potential hotspots for virus transmission","Mitigation":"Improve data collection and analysis of transportation networks, develop predictive modeling for spread in transportation systems","Technologies":"GIS mapping, data analytics platforms, predictive modeling software","People":"Transportation planners, public transportation users","Owner":"Transportation authorities, data scientists, city planners"}]}
